title: Profitable, Reliable & Innovative

section.title: Why Valued?
section.content: Valued is the leading online savings & investment platform in the US. For over 7 years, our customers have saved and invested billions of Dollers that they would normally be tempted to spend.

section.title: Security Comes First?
section.content: Valued uses the highest levels of Internet Security, and it is secured by 256 bits SSL security encryption to ensure that your information is completely protected from fraud.

text2: This template is ready to use, so you don't need to change anything at a component level, unless you want to customize the default styling.

section2.content2: Ant Design is a React UI library that has a lot of easy-to-use components for building elegant UI.

Styled Components gives you total control over your components. Two-factor authentication (2FA) by default on all PiggyVest accounts, to securely protect you from unauthorised access and impersonation.
